content: this is my newest design my palmyra diamond wrap it is a rectangular wrap that has an integrated edging so that it changes with the colour of the scheepjes whirl included is a chart pattern the chart pattern show only one repeat and how to start and end each row you add in the number of repeats you require this wrap can very easily be made wider or smaller by adding or removing repeats i hope you enjoying making it as much as i did suzy x
